dublin_core.dcvalue: MobyApp is a mobile phone application which functions as a decision support tool for health workers, for linking mother and baby records and for tracking mother-baby pairs along the continuum of care across MNCH/HIV services.

Roland van de Ven, Technical Director, Elizabeth Glaser Pediatric AIDS Foundation/Tanzania, Email: roland@pedaids.org; Lucy Fulgence, Country Director Tanzania, D-Tree International, Email: lfulgence@d-tree.org
Tanzania, Tabora region, 25 sites in all districts (Igunga, Kaliua, Nzega Sikonge, Tabora municipal, Uyui and Urambo)
Client education and behavior change communication, Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Electronic health records, HIV/AIDS, Maternal health, Newborn health
